caption.p: Comparison of Botryococcus braunii identified by Microscopy and Chemical Biomarkers. Upper left: B. braunii concentration, visually identified in Boswell Lake sediment. Upper right: Summary of C 24–C 34 hydrocarbons concentration analysed be 2-dimensional (2D) gas chromatography. Lower left: 2-D gas chromatograph indicating the retention times of an C 18–C 38 alkane ladder and squalene standard. Lower right: 2D gas chromatograph of representative sample BL 125. A region of interest, indicated by the black box, was used to quantify the B. braunii type hydrocarbons.
